# (APPENDIX) Appendix {-} 

# Appendix - Distances Between Receivers {#AppendixA}

```{r tidyr4, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=50), tidy = TRUE)
require(pander)
```

The following table lists the latitude and longitude for each pair of receivers, and distance (m) between them:

```{r parameterTableDistance, echo = FALSE}
param.table <- dplyr::select(read.csv("./data/distances.csv", stringsAsFactors=FALSE), 1:7)
pander(param.table, split.cell = 50, split.table = Inf) 
```
